name: ParaL LeX
description:
You switch parallax layers when you get hit, so do get hit.

Background music:

Adi Broshi. (Cool dude, and availabe for work)

Soundcloud - https://soundcloud.com/diroshi?ref=whatsapp&p=i&c=1
E-mail - Broshiadi11@gmail.com

All the other assets were made by me.

*** There was a bug with the flower score, didn't have time to fix***

CONTROLS:

Move: A and D, left and right arrow keys.

Jump: Space, Up arrow.

Reset to checkpoint: R
